//Generated by BehavEd

rem ( "RED Score Increment" );
if ( $get( FLOAT, "redBlock")$, $=$, $0$ )
{
	set ( "redBlock", $1$ );
	use ( "block_r" );
}
use ( "holo_r" );
use ( "score_r_inc" );
use ( "sound_score" );
wait ( 4000.000 );
if ( $get( FLOAT, "redBlock")$, $=$, $1$ )
{
	set ( "redBlock", $0$ );
	use ( "block_r" );
}
